alert.note: Alert for Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 20 at 9:02PM CST until February 23 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Wadena County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 PM CST this evening. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Tuesday night through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
